Package org.mindswap.owls.process.execution

Interface Summary
ExecutionContext Execution contexts provide information used by execution engines to drive execution of processes.
ExecutionSupport<C extends ExecutionContext> This interface specifies the methods that need to be implemented for supporting execution of all control constructs specified by OWL-S as well as execution of all process types.
ExecutionValidator An execution validator is used in the course of (composite) process execution to validate preconditions and results.
ProcessExecutionEngine Process execution engines implement the functionality required to execute atomic as well as composite processes.
ProcessExecutionMonitor An interface that describes functions to monitor process execution.
 

Class Summary
BaseExecutionContext This class stores the (current) values of process variables in the scope of a process instance that is currently being executed.
BaseProcessExecutionMonitor This class servers as the base implementation of process monitors.
DefaultProcessMonitor A simple process monitor implementation that prints the progress to standard out (default constructor), or to a given writer.
SimpleThreadedMonitor Simple monitor to show monitoring for threaded execution.
